reviews.text:
Dog friendly to 5⭐️ as well. My dog enjoyed the plush bed and complimentary treats.
Room is excellently furnished, bed super comfortable. Service is great. Building beautiful old style of 1925. Very close to the station so perfect for a night in style before getting the night train to Stuttgart.

Had the most luxurious stay at the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel. The staff were wonderful and went out of their way to help me when I accidentally arrived a day early. Fabulous rooms, unbelievably comfortable beds, great amenities, rooms well stocked (I loved that each room had a universal travel adaptor for guests so thoughtful). 10/10 would stay here again in a heartbeat.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Esplanade in Zagreb and I’m thrilled to give it a 5-star rating! The hotel is beautifully decorated in an Old Money style, making it one of the most charming and historic establishments in Zagreb. The ambiance exudes elegance and sophistication, which enhances the overall experience.

The staff is exceptionally courteous and provided fantastic hospitality to me and my colleagues. The rooms are superb, offering a perfect blend of comfort and luxury. Additionally, the hotel boasts a beautiful hall that is ideal for organizing weddings and other celebrations.

If you have a generous budget, I highly recommend staying at this hotel. It’s an experience worth every penny, and you won’t be disappointed by the top-notch service and stunning surroundings.

Apsolutely the best hotel in Zagreb. We loved everything about our stay - from our room and convenient location to the exceptional staff. Above all the restaurant and breakfast were truly outstanding, we can not recommend this hotel highly enought.

Probably the best hotel in Zagreb, and they know it. Lots of attitude and low concern fir guests.
Although friendly at check in at 15:00, we were told our room wasn't ready.  We went to the lovely bar and then proceeded to wait for 90 minutes to get a drink and some food.  I finally got frustrated and returned to reception and the then gave me a room key.
Nice room, but AC was barely functioning.   Reported it with no resolution.
The worst part was that there was a very loud party complete with amplification, on a courtyard directly below our room. We asked and the desk told us we should have been notified about the party, but nothing could or would be done.  They said they had lots of complaints but no solution.

No sleep until after 23:00.
No apologies, just said we should have known.

Not 5 star treatment at any level.
We paid for  a suite and instead got a dance party.

Avoid at all costs...
